testcase.name: The Edit portal can allow user to update First Name

testcase.name: User settings should be aditable on homepage

testcase.name: positive1
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on First Name Box.........................................passed And user enters valid Name..................................................passed And user click save button1.................................................passed Then should see Setting saved! message1.....................................passed
